title: Aligner Maintenance
description: Oral Care Tips for Aligner Users: Keep Your Smile Healthy During Treatment.
author: Dr. Ignatius Fernandes
fullContent:
Clear aligners are a comfortable and discreet way to straighten your teeth, but they work best only when your oral hygiene is well maintained.

Since aligners are worn for 20–22 hours a day, trapped food particles and plaque can lead to cavities, bad breath, gum inflammation, and white spots if proper care is not followed.

Brushing after every meal and flossing daily are essential before putting aligners back in, as wearing them over unclean teeth traps bacteria.

Aligners should be cleaned regularly using lukewarm water, a soft toothbrush, and aligner-safe cleaning solutions. Avoid hot water, toothpaste, and eating or drinking anything other than plain water while wearing aligners.

Staying hydrated, carrying an aligner case, and attending regular dental check-ups help ensure smooth and safe treatment.

At Dhotrad’s Sunny Dental Clinics, aligner treatment is always dentist-supervised to deliver healthy, confident smiles. If you are looking for clear aligners or Invisalign care in Hubli, visit Dhotrad’s Sunny Dental Clinics where straight smiles meet healthy care.

title: Dental Jewels
description: Teeth Jewellery in Hubli | Tooth Gems at Dhotrad’s Sunny Dental Clinics
author: Dr. Ignatius Fernandes
fullContent:
Teeth jewellery, also known as tooth gems, is a popular cosmetic dental trend that adds a subtle sparkle to your smile.

When applied professionally, it is safe, stylish, and completely reversible. At Dhotrad’s Sunny Dental Clinics in Hubli, dentist-applied teeth jewellery enhances your smile without harming your natural teeth.

Teeth jewellery involves bonding a small crystal or dental jewel to the surface of a tooth using dental-grade adhesive. The procedure requires no drilling, causes no pain, and does not permanently alter your tooth.

When done by a qualified dentist, teeth jewellery is safe. Before placement, your tooth health, bite alignment, and oral hygiene are carefully assessed, and only healthy teeth are selected.

With proper care, tooth gems can last from six months to two years and can be safely removed at any time.

  • Brush gently around the jewel
  • Avoid biting hard foods directly
  • Attend regular dental check-ups
  • Do not pick or play with the gem

Teeth jewellery is ideal for those seeking a temporary smile enhancement for special occasions, though it is not recommended for individuals with active cavities or gum disease.
